department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Fire Alarm & Detection Systems - Installation and Repair
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Invitation to Proposal (ITP) - Cancelled
### Reference Information

*   **Solicitation Number**: PW-_PWZ-202-11373
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-09-23
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-11 15:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2022-10-19

### Description

The Government of Canada, represented by the Public Works and Government Services Canada, hereby notifies the public of the cancellation of a request for proposal for the supply and installation of fire alarm and detection systems. This project has been withdrawn.

### Notice Details

| Notice Type  | English | French |
|--------------|---------|---------|
| Request for Proposal | Request for Proposal | Demande de Propositions             |
| Procurement Category | Construction | Construction                     |
| Technical Specifications | Fire Alarm & Detection Systems-Installation and Repair | Systèmes de détection et d'alarme incendie- Installation et réparation|
| Type of tender | Competitive - Open Bidding | Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner |
| Trade Agreement | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) | Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC) |

### Contract Details

*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Contact Information**: 
    *   Name: Thompson Valerie
    *   Email: [valerie.thompson@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.thompson@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (204) 509-0349
    *   Fax: (418) 566-6167
    *   Address: Victory Building / Édifice Victory, Room 310, 269 Main Street / 269 rue Main, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3C 1B3
